giwisum karanduwa (nikma: 37:1-9) 10 ”thawada, owun shitim liyen sentimitar ekasiya dahayak diga, sentimitar hatahayak palala, sentimitar hatahayak usa karanduwa sadiya yuthu ya. 11 ehi athulatha da pitatha da thani rathranin aalepa kota, eya wata ran listharayak sadiya yuthuyi. 12 thawada, eya sandaha ran walalu hatharak waththu kota, eka paththakata walalu dekak da anik paththata walalu dekak da bagin ehi kakul hathare eewa damiya yuthu ya. 13 shitim liyen polu sada eewa ranin aalepa kota 14 karanduwa usulagena yana pinisa ehi depaththe athi walalu thulata ee polu damiya yuthu ya. 15 karanduwe walalu thula ma polu thibennata hariya yuthu ya.

goda kalekin kussiye kathawak liyanna bariwuna.ee ugurudandatama hirawenna wada watuna nisa misak kiyanna katha nathi kamata neme.pahugiya masa ekahamara kiyanne ape kussiya udu yatikuru karapu kalayak.ee mokada kiyanawa nam, ma ekka wadakarapu set eken bagekatath wada kussiyata samu dila yanna giya.haha pura kiyala yanna giye mage sahodaraya wage hitapu siga,uu na kiyanne kussiya nikan sohon pittaniya wage thamayi.siga yanna gihin sathi deka yanakota ape lokka manejar ekka gemak dagena yanna hadanawa.ithin lokkath ekkama thawa dennek yanna giya.aluth lokkek enna sathi deka thunak gatha wena nisa matath thawa uyanno dennekutath mulu kusussiyema wgakim tika pawaruna.

gota­bhaya raja­paksha pawa­sana aaka­ra­yata nowa­mbar 17 dina alu­yama me seba­lun nida­has karanne nam, ese kiri­mata lankawe wathman nithi­maya ramuwa thula kisidu awa­ka­sha­yak nathi athara, ese kala hoth eya widha­ya­kaya wisin adhi­ka­rana paddha­thi­yata saha nithiya bala­thmaka kiri­mata bandi sitina aaya­thana ella karana ruju bala­pa­maki.
